title: Atrios hates Jews
author: VD
content_html:
From Atrios:


“Merits of Anti-Semitism”

Now there’s a lovely post.

Obviously, since the “Merits of Anti-Semitism” post is, well, anti-semitic, and Atrios said it was a “lovely post”, Atrios is an unrepentant Jew-hater, wishes to revive the Third Reich, and personally slaughter every Jewish man woman and child with his filed teeth before feasting on their brains.

I was wondering where all those hysterical morons were coming from. Now I understand both the complete unfamiliarity with me and my writing as well as the inability to master basic reading comprehension.
content_text:
From
Atrios
:
“Merits of Anti-Semitism”
Now there’s a lovely post.
Obviously, since the “Merits of Anti-Semitism” post is, well, anti-semitic, and Atrios said it was a “lovely post”, Atrios is an unrepentant Jew-hater, wishes to revive the Third Reich, and personally slaughter every Jewish man woman and child with his filed teeth before feasting on their brains.
I was wondering where all those hysterical morons were coming from.  Now I understand both the complete unfamiliarity with me and my writing as well as the inability to master basic reading comprehension.
